alert.note: Alert for Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:59PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Jones and northeastern Taylor Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 759 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Noodle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anson, Hawley, Noodle, Impact, Funston, Hodges, The Intersection Of Us-180 And Ranch Road 126, Stith, Truby and The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 281 and 286. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
